page.title: 12LIFE STYLES
page.content: A day in the life of a junior gunner Gamecock Barracks, Nuneaton, 0600hrs Reveille,make bed, breakfast,0800hrs start work 1000hrs NAAFI break, work until lunch, lunch from 1200hrs until 1400hrs, finish work at 1600hrs Hobbies; snooker, pool, football, basketball, shooting, fishing. Food; a high protein diet. there are field exercises regularly mainly in Wales. We also have regiments in Germany, the British Army of the Rhine. Wehave 16 troops with about 30 men in each troop. We study Fieldcraft, First Aid, Languages,Driving and Military Studies.We spend one year here.
